className.description: Additional classes spread to the wizard header

closeButtonAriaLabel.description: Aria-label applied to the X (Close) button

description.description: Description of the wizard (React component or element)

isCloseHidden.description: Flag indicating whether the close button should be in the header

onClose.description: Callback function called when the X (Close) button is clicked (Function: (event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLButtonElement>) => void)
